gym_ghost_020_receptionist_01:
Bem-vindo ao Ginásio! Quer eu explique as
regras do Ginásio Teste novamente?
gym_ghost_020_receptionist_02:
Aqui no Ginásio Montenevera, seu teste é
aquecer o público para o evento principal!\r
Isso mesmo — você é o [clr:6] show de abertura [clr:0]!
gym_ghost_020_receptionist_03:
Seu trabalho é subir no palco, nos mostrar algumas
batalhas ferozes de Pokémon e atrair a animação\r
da multidão antes do show da Líder começar!
gym_ghost_020_receptionist_04:
Você pode iniciar o teste de ginásio falando
com MC Trenó na frente do palco do lá de fora.
gym_ghost_020_mc_01:
Yo, Treinador[o;a:g]! Você é quem está realizando
o ato de abertura hoje? Meu nome é MC Trenó!\r
Este é o palco![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_02:
Vou manda a real. Nós vamos fazer você fazer
algumas batalhas com duplas! É onde você tem\r
dois Pokémon lutando de cada lado[npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_04:
That’ll let you sledge up double the opponents
and get the audience twice as excited! The venue\r
will be so hot, it’ll melt the Montenevera snow![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_05:
Once you get the audience worked up and ready
to go, that’ll be the cue for our leader to take the\r
stage! That’s how you pass our Gym Test, yo![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_19:
Your opening act begins as soon as you get up on
stage! There’ll be no backing down until you win\r
three times in a row, so make sure you’re ready![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_06:
You good on the deets for the opening act and
our Gym Test? Ready to sledge ’em up?![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_no_double:
Hey now! You’re gonna need two Pokémon for
this Gym Test, yo![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_cancel:
I feel ya. Openin’ for Ryme is no easy task! Make
sure you’re ready to go before we start![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_07:
Sweet! Just play it by ear—you’ll do great! Head
on up to the stage![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_20:
What’s up, Monteneveraaa! Today’s opening act
will be three back-to-back Double Battles by our\r
challenger here, [trnm:0]![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_21:
And the first of their three opponents will be a
young performer who makes it look like a breeze![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_boy_01:
Double Battles—that means one plus one, right?
Can you do that math?
gym_ghost_020_system_01: The audience’s cheering got a little louder!
gym_ghost_020_mc_22:
The Montenevera stage has all the latest tech!
The more excited the audience gets, the more\r
the stage will light up![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_23: Keep on sledgin’! You got this![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_24:
Aaand our challenger’s next opponent will be a
musician with a bit of a unique style...[npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_musician_01:
Strong complements weak! The harmony of two
Pokémon battling in unison!
gym_ghost_020_system_02: The audience is really getting excited!
gym_ghost_020_mc_26:
Your opening act’s turned the cheering AND the
stage lighting up to 11![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_27:
What a surprise from our new challenger! Who’d
have thought they’d sledge it up this much?![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_28:
Next is your last opponent. And it’s none other
than...[npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_31:
Bein’ an MC isn’t my only forte—I can battle too!
I’ll sledge ya up real good in a Double Battle![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_system_03:
The audience’s excitement has reached a fever
pitch!
gym_ghost_020_mobs_01: Whoa! Awesome! That was a great battle!
gym_ghost_020_mobs_02: How lucky! That was a rare sight!
gym_ghost_020_mc_13:
Thank yooou, [trnm:0]!\c
Congratulations, you passed the Gym Test! Give
’em a round of applause, everybody![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_14:
I feel a scary-good sense of unity in the crowd!
Perfecto! We’re ready to go for the main event![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_15:
C’mon, everybody—say it with me! This is what
you’ve all been waitin’ for...[npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_16: Give it up for the MC of RIP! Ryyyyyyyyyme![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mobs_03: Ryme! Ryme! Ryme! Ryme! Ryme! Ryme!
gym_ghost_020_ghost_01: What’s all this noise I’m hearin’?![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_020_ghost_02: This crowd’s so loud, it could wake the dead...[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_020_ghost_03:
Lemme tell ya what I wanna hear—y’all feelin’
good?![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_020_mobs_04:
Yeah! We’re feelin’ good! Ryme! Ryme! Ryme!
Ryme! Woooooo!
gym_ghost_020_ghost_04:
Thanks for the killer opener, baby! Now I’ll get
this started for real.[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_17:
Congrats on the Gym Test! That was sick, yo.
Thanks![npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_mc_18:
Give us a min for some Ryme time, ya feel me?
Go ahead and tell the lobby staffer you passed.[npcn:3B]
gym_ghost_020_stopper_01:
The audience is enthralled by the Gym Leader!
Go talk to the lobby staffer!
